ygData.subject: Re: LOOK AT THIS VERY IMPORTANT SERIOUS
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello Chris, I have to admit I am divided on the subject.  While it is true that we are limited in where we can solo, not all SKs are unable to travel.  I am a
ygData.messageBody:
Hello Chris,

I have to admit I am divided on the subject. While it is true that we
are limited in where we can solo, not all SKs are unable to travel. I am a
female DE on Zek, I am able to freely roam the Ogre and Troll lands and thus
give me access to Rathe and South Karana. I hunted the wuss side of High
Hold and the NPCs in the Karanas untill my High Hold Faction was high enough
to simply walk through wistling.
I wish I did have invis when crossing the Oasis or attempting to get to the
ship in Freeport or simply to zone into EC durring peak Pace War time. Non
evil races can move through these areas too, but getting past gate guardss
for a bind in the city will be a trick. Remeber, EQ is a team game. Have
you hugged your Enchantress today? She gets invis at level 4. Mind you,
wizards do not get it untill level 16 and spells are their business.
I want to see a pet that will not just stand there picking its butt
when someone blasts me with lightening. Is it so hard to assign the masters
PvP range to the pet upon casting? I do not believe the programming code
for that would be very difficult. I would like to see my harm touch go to
15hp per level or become a no resist attack or return more than once per day
with at least one hour in between ( to prevent imballancing PvP ). Perhaps
SK unique spells?
Why is it so impossible for us to have Life Tap at level 15? Do those 10 hp
matter that much when compared our 350+?
HECK we have one attack and a level 8 skellie untill 20th when we get
our second attack that doesn't get up to speed untill learly level 22 when
we get the whopping level 12 skellie, who still will not defend me from
other players, but at least I can give 'ol loser bones a Vampiric Hug for
some life back (haven't tried this yet).

Question: How long does a level 12 skellie last in Guk?
Answer: Long enough to bring the house down on you because of its low
level, and die.

We have a whole slew of issues.

All I ever hear is it gets better at level X. I very much enjoy the SK and
all of its roleplay potential, but Verant didn't do a very good job
ballancing her against others in the PvP arena or the battlefield.

~Xillith, Lady of Pain
Keeper of the Knights
Rallos Zek


>From: Chris Brodhecker <rangersrulenhl@...>
>Reply-To: eq_shadowknights@onelist.com
>To: eq_shadowknights@onelist.com
>Subject: [eq_shadowknights] LOOK AT THIS VERY IMPORTANT SERIOUS
>Date: Thu, 24 Jun 1999 09:05:12 -0700 (PDT)
>
>From: Chris Brodhecker <rangersrulenhl@...>
>
>
> Hello. I am sure many of you other shadow knights
>have thought of this but we must take action about
>this subject: Shadow Knights NEED invisibility at
>earlier levels. They DO get the spell but at level
>30. I think they should get it at level 22 because of
>two main reasons. 1) We are hybrids so we already have
>some EXP penalties and we can't get to three quarters
>of the hunting grounds so are forced to hunt in the
>area around our home city until level 30. 2) At level
>2 we get the spells that necro's get at levek 8 EXCEPT
>for the invisibility spell. All of us Shadow Knights
>should join in and petition for invisibility at level
>22! We can get them to change it. Feel free to drop me
>a line if you are on fenin ro
>
>Fizal, Fenin Ro
